mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_exam (name, paper_id, start_time, end_time, duration, status, creator_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{paperId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{status}, #{creatorId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT er.student_id) FROM biz_exam_record er WHERE er.exam_id = #{examId} AND er.status >= 1
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT er.student_id) FROM biz_exam_record er WHERE er.exam_id = #{examId} AND er.status >= 2 AND er.score IS NOT NULL

SELECT er.student_id AS id, u.username AS studentId, u.real_name AS name, er.start_time AS startTime, er.submit_time AS submitTime, CASE WHEN er.status = 0 THEN 'not_started' WHEN er.status = 1 AND er.submit_time IS NULL THEN 'online' WHEN er.submit_time IS NOT NULL THEN 'submitted' ELSE 'unknown' END AS status, COALESCE(er.switch_count, 0) AS switchCount, COALESCE(er.progress, 0) AS progress, COALESCE(er.last_active_time, NULL) AS lastActiveTime, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM biz_monitor_warning w WHERE w.exam_id = er.exam_id AND w.student_id = er.student_id ) AS warningCount FROM biz_exam_record er LEFT JOIN users u ON er.student_id = u.id WHERE er.exam_id = #{examId} ORDER BY er.start_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_exam_monitor_event (exam_id, student_id, event_type, event_data, severity) VALUES (#{examId}, #{studentId}, #{type}, #{message}, 'WARNING')
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_exam_record SET status = 1, submit_time = NOW() WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND student_id = #{studentId} AND status = 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM biz_exam_student WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND user_id = #{studentId}
